trans-unit.source: Represents a custom task pane in a Microsoft Office application.
Use a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane> object in an application-level add-in to modify a custom task pane, or to respond when the location or visibility of the custom task pane changes.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane>中应用程序级外接程序来修改一个自定义任务窗格或位置或自定义任务窗格可见性更改时进行响应对象。

trans-unit.source: Task panes are user interface panels that are typically docked to one side of an application window.
trans-unit.target: 任务窗格是用户界面面板，通常停靠到应用程序窗口的一侧。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to create custom task panes, see [Custom Task Panes](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-task-panes.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何创建自定义任务窗格的信息，请参阅[自定义任务窗格](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-task-panes.md)。

trans-unit.source: To control the size or location of the custom task pane, you can use properties such as <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.Height%2A>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.Width%2A>, and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.Visible%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制的大小或自定义任务窗格的位置，可以使用属性，如<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.Height%2A>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.Width%2A>，和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.Visible%2A>。

trans-unit.source: To respond when the custom task pane moves or changes visibility, you can handle the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.DockPositionChanged> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.VisibleChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: 若要响应自定义任务窗格移动或更改可见性时，你可以处理<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.DockPositionChanged>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.VisibleChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: 用法

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom task pane by using the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPaneCollection.Add%28System.Windows.Forms.UserControl%2CSystem.String%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何通过创建自定义任务窗格<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPaneCollection.Add%28System.Windows.Forms.UserControl%2CSystem.String%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: The example uses properties of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane> object to set the default appearance of the custom task pane, and it defines an event handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.DockPositionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用的属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane>对象设置的默认外观的自定义任务窗格，而且还定义的事件处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.DockPositionChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: To compile this example, copy the code into the `ThisAddIn` class in an add-in project for an application that supports custom task panes.
trans-unit.target: 若要编译此示例中，将代码复制到`ThisAddIn`支持自定义任务窗格的应用程序的外接程序项目中的类。

trans-unit.source: Replace the default `ThisAddIn_Startup` method in the `ThisAddIn` class with the `ThisAddIn_Startup` method in this example.
trans-unit.target: 将默认替换`ThisAddIn_Startup`中的方法`ThisAddIn`类，该类具有`ThisAddIn_Startup`在此示例中的方法。

trans-unit.source: This example also assumes that the project contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl> named `MyUserControl`, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl> contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel> named `FlowPanel`.
trans-unit.target: 此示例还假定该项目包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>名为`MyUserControl`，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel>名为`FlowPanel`。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl" /> that provides the user interface of the custom task pane.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl" /> that provides the user interface of the custom task pane.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl" />提供自定义任务窗格的用户界面。

trans-unit.source: This property returns the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl> that was used to create the custom task pane.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>用于创建自定义任务窗格。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Custom Task Panes](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-task-panes.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[自定义任务窗格](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-task-panes.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.Control%2A> property to modify the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl> on the task pane in the event handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.DockPositionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.Control%2A>属性来修改大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>上的事件处理程序中的任务窗格<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.DockPositionChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane>.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.Dispose" /> method of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane" /> has already been called.
Gets or sets a value that specifies where the custom task pane is located relative to the application window.
One of the <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoCTPDockPosition</c> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<c>Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoCTPDockPosition</c>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoCTPDockPosition.msoCTPDockPositionRight</c>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<c>Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoCTPDockPosition.msoCTPDockPositionRight</c>。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the values of the `Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoCTPDockPosition` enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出的值`Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoCTPDockPosition`枚举。

trans-unit.source: Value
Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Docks the custom task pane to the left side of the window.
trans-unit.target: 自定义任务窗格停靠窗口的左侧。

trans-unit.source: Docks the custom task pane to the top of the window.
trans-unit.target: 自定义任务窗格停靠窗口的顶部。

trans-unit.source: Docks the custom task pane to the right side of the window.
trans-unit.target: 自定义任务窗格停靠窗口的右侧。

trans-unit.source: Docks the custom task pane to the bottom of the window.
trans-unit.target: 自定义任务窗格停靠窗口的底部。

trans-unit.source: Displays the custom task pane in front of the window.
trans-unit.target: 显示自定义任务窗格在窗口的前面。

trans-unit.source: The user can drag the task pane to any location in the window.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以将任务窗格拖动到窗口中的任何位置。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a custom task pane and configures different default sizes for when the pane displays in front of the active application window, and when it is docked.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建一个自定义任务窗格，并当窗格显示在活动的应用程序窗口中的前面和它停靠时配置不同的默认大小。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane>.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.Dispose" /> method of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane" /> has already been called.

The value of the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.DockPositionRestrict" /> property is <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoCTPDockPosition.msoCTPDockPositionRestrictNoChange</c> when you try to change the value of the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.DockPosition" /> property.
-or-

You try to set this property in the event handler for the <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.DockPositionChanged" /> or <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.VisibleChanged" /> event.
Occurs when the user changes the dock position of the custom task pane, or when code changes the value of the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.DockPosition" /> property.
The following code example demonstrates an event handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.DockPositionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示的事件处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.DockPositionChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This event handler changes the horizontal or vertical arrangement of controls on the task pane by modifying the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel.FlowDirection%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel> on the task pane.
trans-unit.target: 此事件处理程序通过修改更改任务窗格上的控件的水平或垂直排列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel.FlowDirection%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel>任务窗格中。

trans-unit.source: This code example assumes that the task pane contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl> named `MyUserControl`, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl> contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel> named `FlowPanel`.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例假定任务窗格包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>名为`MyUserControl`，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel>名为`FlowPanel`。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example provided for <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane>.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that prevents the custom task pane from being docked in the specified position.
One of the <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoCTPDockPositionRestrict</c> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<c>Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoCTPDockPositionRestrict</c>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoCTPDockPosition.msoCTPDockPositionRestrictNone</c>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<c>Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoCTPDockPosition.msoCTPDockPositionRestrictNone</c>。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the values of the `Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoCTPDockPositionRestrict` enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出的值`Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoCTPDockPositionRestrict`枚举。

trans-unit.source: Value
Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: There are no restrictions on the docking behavior of the custom task pane.
trans-unit.target: 没有自定义任务窗格的停靠行为限制。

trans-unit.source: The dock position cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: 无法更改的停靠位置。

trans-unit.source: If the custom task pane is floating, it cannot be docked to a side of the window.
trans-unit.target: 如果自定义任务窗格浮动的不能停靠窗口的一侧。

trans-unit.source: The custom task pane cannot be docked to the top or the bottom of the window.
trans-unit.target: 自定义任务窗格中不能固定到顶部或窗口的底部。

trans-unit.source: The custom task pane cannot be docked to the left or right side of the window.
trans-unit.target: 无法向左或窗口右侧停靠自定义任务窗格。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.Dispose" /> method of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane" /> has already been called.
Gets or sets the height of the custom task pane, in points.
The height of the custom task pane, in points.
trans-unit.target: 自定义任务窗格，以磅为单位的高度。

trans-unit.source: Do not use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.Height%2A> property if the custom task pane is docked to the left or the right of the document window.
trans-unit.target: 不要使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.Height%2A>属性，如果自定义任务窗格停靠向左或文档窗口的右侧。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.DockPosition%2A> property is `Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoCTPDockPosition.msoCTPDockPositionRight` or `Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoCTPDockPosition.msoCTPDockPositionLeft`, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.Height%2A> property returns 0 and throws a <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException> if you try to set it.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.DockPosition%2A>属性是`Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoCTPDockPosition.msoCTPDockPositionRight`或`Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoCTPDockPosition.msoCTPDockPositionLeft`、<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.Height%2A>属性，则返回 0，并且引发<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException>如果你尝试将其设置。

trans-unit.source: The maximum height depends on the dock position.
trans-unit.target: 最大高度依赖于停靠位置。

trans-unit.source: When the custom task pane is docked to the top or bottom of the document window, the maximum height is approximately half the height of the screen.
trans-unit.target: 自定义任务窗格停靠到顶部或文档窗口的底部，最大高度时，大约一半屏幕的高度。

trans-unit.source: When the custom task pane is floating, there is no maximum height.
trans-unit.target: 当自定义任务窗格浮动的时没有任何最大高度。

trans-unit.source: The minimum height depends on several factors, and can change in future releases of Microsoft Office.
trans-unit.target: 最小高度取决于多种因素，并可以更改在将来版本的 Microsoft Office。

trans-unit.source: If you try to set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.Height%2A> property to a value that is less than the minimum height, the application will automatically reassign the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.Height%2A> property to the minimum height.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.Height%2A>属性小于最小高度的值，应用程序将自动重新分配<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.Height%2A>属性的最小高度。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a custom task pane that has a specified height when it displays in front of the active application window.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建一个在活动的应用程序窗口的前面显示时具有指定的高度的自定义任务窗格。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane>.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.DockPosition" /> property is <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoCTPDockPosition.msoCTPDockPositionRight</c> or <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoCTPDockPosition.msoCTPDockPositionLeft</c> when you try to set the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.Height" /> property.
-or-

You try to set the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.Height" /> property in the event handler for the <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.DockPositionChanged" /> or <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.VisibleChanged" /> event.
The <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.Dispose" /> method of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane" /> has already been called.
Gets the title of the custom task pane.
The title of the custom task pane.
trans-unit.target: 在自定义任务窗格的标题。

trans-unit.source: To set the title of the custom task pane, use the `title` parameter of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPaneCollection.Add%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置自定义任务窗格的标题，请使用`title`参数<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPaneCollection.Add%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.Dispose" /> method of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane" /> has already been called.
Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the custom task pane is visible.
<see langword="true" /> if the custom task pane is visible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果自定义任务窗格是可见的;否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Office applications do not provide a default UI for users to display custom task panes.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Office 应用程序不提供默认的用户的 UI，以显示自定义任务窗格。

trans-unit.source: If you create a custom task pane in your add-in, you should also create a UI element, such as a button, that users can click to display or hide your custom task pane.
trans-unit.target: 如果在外接程序中创建自定义任务窗格中，你还应创建 UI 元素，如按钮，可供用户单击以显示或隐藏自定义任务窗格。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Custom Task Panes](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-task-panes.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[自定义任务窗格](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-task-panes.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a custom task pane and displays it.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建一个自定义任务窗格，并显示它。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane>.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane>。

trans-unit.source: You try to set this property in the event handler for the <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.DockPositionChanged" /> or <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.VisibleChanged" /> event.
The <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.Dispose" /> method of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane" /> has already been called.
Occurs when the user displays or closes the custom task pane, or when code changes the value of the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.Visible" /> property.
Microsoft Office applications do not provide a default UI for users to display custom task panes.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Office 应用程序不提供默认的用户的 UI，以显示自定义任务窗格。

trans-unit.source: If you create a custom task pane in your add-in, you should also create a UI element, such as a button, that users can click to display or hide your custom task pane.
trans-unit.target: 如果在外接程序中创建自定义任务窗格中，你还应创建 UI 元素，如按钮，可供用户单击以显示或隐藏自定义任务窗格。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Custom Task Panes](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-task-panes.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[自定义任务窗格](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-task-panes.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates an event handler for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.VisibleChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示的事件处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.VisibleChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This event handler updates the state of a toggle button on the Ribbon whenever the user opens or closes the custom task pane.
trans-unit.target: 每当用户打开或关闭自定义任务窗格时，此事件处理程序更新的功能区上的切换按钮的状态。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided in [Walkthrough: Synchronizing a Custom Task Pane with a Ribbon Button](/visualstudio/vsto/walkthrough-synchronizing-a-custom-task-pane-with-a-ribbon-button.md).
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自[演练： 将自定义任务窗格与功能区按钮同步](/visualstudio/vsto/walkthrough-synchronizing-a-custom-task-pane-with-a-ribbon-button.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the custom task pane, in points.
The width of the custom task pane, in points.
trans-unit.target: 自定义任务窗格，以磅为单位的宽度。

trans-unit.source: Do not use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.Width%2A> property if the custom task pane is docked to the top or the bottom of the document window.
trans-unit.target: 不要使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.Width%2A>属性，如果自定义任务窗格停靠到顶部或文档窗口的底部。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.DockPosition%2A> property is `Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoCTPDockPosition.msoCTPDockPositionTop` or `Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoCTPDockPosition.msoCTPDockPositionBottom`, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.Width%2A> property returns 0 and throws a <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException> if you try to set it.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.DockPosition%2A>属性是`Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoCTPDockPosition.msoCTPDockPositionTop`或`Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoCTPDockPosition.msoCTPDockPositionBottom`、<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.Width%2A>属性，则返回 0，并且引发<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException>如果你尝试将其设置。

trans-unit.source: The maximum width depends on the dock position.
trans-unit.target: 最大宽度取决于的停靠位置。

trans-unit.source: When the custom task pane is docked to the left or right of the document window, the maximum width is approximately half the width of the screen.
trans-unit.target: 自定义任务窗格停靠到左侧或右侧的文档窗口中，最大宽度时，大约一半屏幕的宽度。

trans-unit.source: When the custom task pane is floating, there is no maximum width.
trans-unit.target: 当自定义任务窗格浮动的时没有任何最大宽度。

trans-unit.source: The minimum width depends on several factors, and can change in future releases of Microsoft Office.
trans-unit.target: 最小宽度取决于多种因素，并可以更改在将来版本的 Microsoft Office。

trans-unit.source: If you try to set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.Width%2A> property to a value that is less than the minimum width, the application will automatically reassign the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.Width%2A> property to the minimum width.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.Width%2A>属性小于最小宽度的值，应用程序将自动重新分配<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.Width%2A>属性的最小宽度。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a custom task pane that has a different default width when it displays in front of the active application window, and when it is docked to the left or right side of the window.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建一个具有不同的默认宽度时它显示在活动的应用程序窗口中的前面和左侧或右侧窗口停靠时的自定义任务窗格。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane>.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.DockPosition" /> property is <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoCTPDockPosition.msoCTPDockPositionTop</c> or <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoCTPDockPosition.msoCTPDockPositionBottom</c> when you try to set the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.Width" /> property.
-or-

You try to set the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.Width" /> property in the event handler for the <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.DockPositionChanged" /> or <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.VisibleChanged" /> event.
The <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.Dispose" /> method of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane" /> has already been called.
Gets the document window that the custom task pane is associated with.
An object that represents the document window that the custom task pane is associated with.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，表示与自定义任务窗格关联的文档窗口。

trans-unit.source: To specify the document window that the custom task pane is associated with, use the `window` parameter of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPaneCollection.Add%28System.Windows.Forms.UserControl%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Object%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定自定义任务窗格是与相关联的文档窗口，使用`window`参数<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPaneCollection.Add%28System.Windows.Forms.UserControl%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Object%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: The type of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.Window%2A> property depends on the application.
trans-unit.target: 一种<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.Window%2A>属性取决于应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the valid types of the `window` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出的有效类型`window`参数。

trans-unit.source: Application
trans-unit.target: 应用程序

trans-unit.source: Parameter type
trans-unit.target: 参数类型

trans-unit.source: Word
trans-unit.target: 字

trans-unit.source: Excel
trans-unit.target: Excel

trans-unit.source: PowerPoint
trans-unit.target: PowerPoint

trans-unit.source: InfoPath
trans-unit.target: InfoPath

trans-unit.source: Outlook
trans-unit.target: Outlook

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Custom Task Panes](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-task-panes.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[自定义任务窗格](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-task-panes.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane.Dispose" /> method of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.CustomTaskPane" /> has already been called.
